title: Audio and recording not working since Android 9
content:
Hello,

Since updating to Android Pie I have been having audio issues with my phone.  Using the speakers, or headsets do not produce any audio, I've tried 6 different headsets.  I also have an issue with recording any audio, and when I answer or use anything with mic functions it causes my phone or the app to crash (phone app included).

I purchased a Bluetooth headset as I noticed audio could be produced via a Bluetooth device, however recording from that device still results in a crashed app or phone.

I have tried a factory reset, as well as reflashing the OTA recovery for Sailfish.

I am using a 32gb Google Pixel purchased under Telus, in Sept of the inaugural launch year in Canada.

I am now located and living in Auckland, New Zealand and there are no designated repair services out here.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Jason
